results.description: Unlock your displays on your Mac! Flexible HiDPI scaling, XDR/HDR extra brightness, virtual screens, DDC control, extra dimming, PIP/streaming, EDID override and lots more!
Wazuh - The Open Source Security Platform. Unified XDR and SIEM protection for endpoints and cloud workloads.
Intelligent adaptive brightness for your external monitors
Threat Hunting query in Microsoft 365 Defender, XDR. Provide out-of-the-box KQL hunting queries - App, Email, Identity and Endpoint.
Unlock the full brightness of the XDR display of your MacBook Pro
A middleware-style generic resource loader built with web games in mind.
Free and Open Source alternative to Vivid macOS application to extend Apple XDR display brightness from 500 up to 1600 nits.

Jimi is an automation first no-code platform designed and developed originally for Security Orchestration and Response. Since its launch jimi has developed into a fully fledged IT automation platform which effortlessly integrates with your existing tools unlocking the potential for autonomous IT and Security operations.
An IDE and translation engine for detection engineers and threat hunters. Be faster, write smarter, keep 100% privacy.
A really good DFIR automation for collecting and analyzing evidence designed for cybersecurity professionals.
Fully automated host & network intrusion detection platform. Detects malware from behavioural patterns rather than signatures and enables deeper visibility than legacy tools.

Roota is a public-domain language of threat detection and response that combines native queries from a SIEM, EDR, XDR, or Data Lake with standardized metadata and threat intelligence to enable automated translation into other languages
